    static <C extends @Nullable Object & @Nullable AutoCloseable>
    ClosingFuture<C>
    ClosingFuture.eventuallyClosing(ListenableFuture<C> future, Executor closingExecutor)
    Deprecated.
    Creating Futures of closeable types is dangerous in general because the underlying value may never be closed if the Future is canceled after its operation begins.
    static <V extends @Nullable Object>
    ClosingFuture<V>
